definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)

sentences.english: Metonymy expresses in a disguised form among other spiritual field and culture phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 转喻在其他精神领域和文化现象中也有变相的表现。

sentences.english: But personage of know the inside story thinks, this coverts namely actually leave one's post.
sentences.chinese: 但有知情人士认为，这实际上就是变相离职。

sentences.english: The occurrence of squall lines is frequently associated with instability energy and vertical wind shear.
sentences.chinese: 飑线的产生经常与不稳定能量和垂直风切变相联系。

sentences.english: Magnesium phthalate dihydrate was synthesized by rheological phase reaction.
sentences.chinese: 用流变相反应法合成了二水邻苯二甲酸镁。

sentences.english: Manganese salicylate was synthesized with the rheological phase reaction method.
sentences.chinese: 用流变相反应法合成了水杨酸锰配合物。

sentences.english: Quite a bit of criticism of China is disguised protectionism.
sentences.chinese: 相当多的对中国的批评都是变相的贸易保护主义。
她的脸因恐慌而变相了。

sentences.english: In fact, this is a disguised form of workers deprived of the right to rest.
sentences.chinese: 其实，这是对劳动者休息权的变相剥夺。

sentences.english: Petrol prices increased in disguise and TNB price increase, is one example.
sentences.chinese: 汽油价格变相提高，电费起价，已是一个例子。

sentences.english: The price of labor is indirectly suppressed, too.
sentences.chinese: 劳动力的价格也被变相的压低了。

sentences.english: Agreed that LS the view, truly a little looks like propagandizes in disguised form.
sentences.chinese: 同意LS的说法，确实有点像变相宣传。

sentences.english: Advocating Petty Bourgeoisie in disguise whitewash.
sentences.chinese: 鼓吹小资情调是变相的粉饰太平。

sentences.english: Is defeated possibly is in disguised form victory, the neap tide is the high tide start.
sentences.chinese: 失败可能是变相的胜利，最低潮就是高潮的开始。

sentences.english: Samarium salicylate is synthesized by the rheological phase reaction method.
sentences.chinese: 用流变相合成了水杨酸钐。

sentences.english: If this is so, roaming charges can be eliminated in disguise.
sentences.chinese: 如果这样算的话，漫游费可以说是变相取消了。

definition: must not/may not/not to be allowed/cannot
